duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide comprehensive account support to a client or group of clients, with limited direction from a more senior team member.
Act as a mentor and leader for more junior team members.
Reviews and supports in enrollment, benchmarking, financial and utilization data based on financial review standards.
Maintains relationships with internal and external business partners and carriers.
Provide mentoring and guidance to junior team members, such as Account Coordinators.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or a related field (Master's preferred)
